content: worked now 20 22 heel sts remain gusset setup still continuing to work with d only pick up and knit 17 18 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit this one continue by knitting all the 32 36 held instep sts pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap and knit it pick up 17 18 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the 38 41 other sole sts now you have 32 36 instep sts and 56 60 sole sts this is the new beginning of the round gusset decrease round 1 with d instep knit 32 36 sole k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 round 2 with l tw knit across all sts round 3 with l instep knit 32 36 sole k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 round 4 with d tw knit across all sts work these 4 rounds 6 6 times i e 24 rounds total decreasing 2 sts every other round now you have 32 36 instep sts and 32 36 sole sts foot stop decreasing and continue to work stripes as established i e work 2-row stripes in stockinette and always tw at every color change work until foot is approx 1 75 2 inches shorter than desired length end after having worked 2 rounds of l break l leaving a tail long enough to weave in toe is worked in d only ©caoua coffee 2013 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved flying dutchman v 1 2 page 5/6 flying dutchman socks - by caoua coffee toe round 1 decrease round k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 round 2 plain round knit all sts repeat these 2 rounds until you have 36 sts left on your needles then always work round 1 until there are only 16 sts left finishing leaving a tail of at least 8 inches break yarn and close the toe using kitchener stitch weave in all ends using them to close any holes that may have occurred knit a second sock and enjoy about this pattern in the flying dutchman der fliegende holländer -
